mode.description: Which system should be used as internally. HotkeylessAHK or xdotool.

host.description: An IP address to the HotkeylessAHK / xdotool server. Set this to localhost and port to -1 to use a locally installed xdotool.

port.description: The port of the HotkeylessAHK server. Set this to -1 and host to localhost to use a locally installed xdotool.
